TestGroupDocumentation.Title: minInclusive5 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a minInclusive-5.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a int restricted SimpleType with minInclusive value 2147483647.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int minInclusive-5.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls minInclusive-5-1.xml document which specifies valid value 2147483647 for the int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-minInclusive-5 element, sets the values: 2147483647 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int minInclusive-5.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls minInclusive-5-1.xml document which specifies valid value 2147483647 for the int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-minInclusive-5 element, sets the values: -2147483648, 0, 2147483646 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int minInclusive-5.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-minInclusive-5 type, sets the values: 2147483647 and expects the validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int minInclusive-5.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-minInclusive-5 type, sets the values: -2147483648, 0, 2147483646 and expects validation to fail.
